Title: Bleach: Fade to Black, I Call Your Name
Writer: Natsuko Takahashi (screenplay), Tite Kubo (manga), Steve Kramer (script adaptation)
Actors: Masakazu Morita, Fumiko Orikasa, Aya Hirano, Hiroshi Kamiya
Plot: An explosion happens in the middle of Seireitei, and Rukia has a memory loss. Then Urahara tries to seek the background of the events.
